title: Denis Koberskiy
text:
Denis Vitalyevich Koberskiy (; born 24 February 1974 in <a href="Khabarovsk">Khabarovsk</a>) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
His father <a href="Vitali%20Koberskiy">Vitali Koberskiy</a> is a coach and a former player.
